You're Invited! The Inagural Atlantic BT "Thirsty Thursday"

Join Us

Thursday May 7th


This Thursday we’re hosting the inaugural Atlantic BT “Thirsty Thursday” party and you’re invited! We’re opening our doors, clearing out the parking lot and inviting our friends in the community to head over to ABT’s headquarters and have some fun with us!

This Week We Will Have

Details

What: Atlantic BT’s Inaugural Thirsty Thursday Party
When: Thursday, May 7, 2015 from 4 - 7 p.m.
Where: Atlantic BT’s Level 1 Lounge: 4509 Creedmoor Road, Raleigh, NC 27612
RSVP: http://www.atlanticbt.com


Can’t Make It This Thursday?
Don’t worry, we’re just getting started. We’re making “Thirsty Thursdays” a new Triangle tradition. We’ve got other events lined up throughout the summer. Check out our schedule of upcoming Thirsty Thursday events and be sure to come hang out with Atlantic BT this summer!
